extendedInfo.description: "500px is a photographic community powered by creative people from all over the world that lets you share and discover inspiring photographs." (http://500px.com/) 500px Land is an Android application, giving you access to this fast growing community. It uses the 500px API to browse the lists of most popular, editors' choice, upcoming, fresh, your friends, your favorites, and your photographs.You don't have to be a member of 500px to use this application, but you have to be to use all the features. You will also need to give the app access to browse your friends lists, your favorites, and your photographs.The photographs may contain some tasteful nudity. There is a setting in the application to show the risque content. It's disabled by default.If you install this application on a tablet, it will use the additional display space by aligning the photos in a grid.Holding a photo in the list will bring up a menu with additional options. YOu must be logged in to take advantage of this feature.This application uses the 500px(tm) API and is not endorsed or certified by 500px or 500px Inc. All 500px Trademarks displayed on this application are property of 500px Inc. All photographs are property of their respective owners.

reviews.title: Missing Necessary Features
reviews.comment: Well improved app. Nice to go straight to looking at brilliant photos and like/disliking/favoriting. Still missing a search, and zoom, but great viewer for the site.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: So far interface is nice,  but can\'t log in to rate or do anything... I press authorize,  but just stays on the same Page. Does not open app as described...mytouch 4gs
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good idea but...!?
reviews.comment: On Galaxy Note, fast connection, yet the app is annoyingly lagging... Once lagging addressed, the rating will simply go higher :) thump up
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Beautiful photos Ugly Layout.
reviews.comment: How can you display such high quality photos with such an ugly layout. The way we view these photos could be better and small hiccups with Galaxy Nexus shameful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Force close
reviews.comment: Alot of force closes also keeps saying network error when posting comment randomly on HTC sensation

reviews.title: Terrible performance
reviews.comment: On a Samsung Galaxy Tab 8.9, the app is beautiful, but scrolling performance is unbearable. Uninstall, and back to using Brilliance...

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: Constantly crashes

reviews.title: Cert good
reviews.comment: Best 500px app on Android so far.

reviews.title: Brilliant app!
reviews.comment: Gorgeous UI and wonderful accessibility, let\'s you access your account and all. Best 500px app on the market. Only downside is that you have to authorise every time you use it - at least on my TouchPad that\'s how it goes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fantastic app, I love it so far. Great UI, clean and simple. Easy to use but does a great job of displaying the images.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good app, very clean just like the 500px site. Just add the option to add a photo to our favs and make the like/share/comments page a little prettier.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great so far, the but
reviews.comment: Looks like you can \"Like\" the same image over and over. Also need the ability to Fav an image and leave comments.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app so far!  The first thing I see that I\'d like added is the ability to leave comments.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stupidity in memory usage
reviews.comment: The memory usage on this one really disrupts an otherwise good app. When in use app caches all downloaded pics in local / internal memor
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No previews
reviews.comment: Was good but 2 days later, no previews are displayed. HTC Desire HD 2.3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very nice for 1.0 release
reviews.comment: Very nice looking, easy to use app. The only annoyance for me is that the position of the list is not maintained when changing orientation of the phon
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice one!
reviews.comment: The only thing I would love to see is something that allows me to make sure it only activate using wifi has my data e pack is not that large.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: needs add to favorite option
reviews.comment: the one big thing missing is the ability to add photos to favorites. i\'ve seen so many great photos in popular section (mostly) that are now lost among thousands of photos on 500px and i can\'t find them again (unless i\'d be browsing the entire section) because i couldn\'t add them to favorites. also the like button (that turns green when pressed) is so small that i need several tries until i hit it instead of enlarging the image. there are some other things but they\'ve already been mentioned in other comments.  very nice work though! looking forward for your updates ;)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent so far - Abbreviated list of fixes/opts.
reviews.comment: - Needs a zoom function - When adjusting the phone from portrait to landscape the list of photos starts from the top instead of staying where you are currently located in the list. - When viewing a photo and you slide the photo to view the photo\'s information:  If the text is short everything below the text is a gray color instead of being transparent. - Consider adding an option to select a category.  For example maybe holding a finger on Editors Choice and select box. - Option to purchase wallpaper.Bionic
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love the app and the ui. One problem when you view a photo in landscape and hit back it brings you back to the top of the list. A zoom would be good
reviews.author: A Google User
